content: m1r ssk k2 repeat around round 26 k1 ssk k1 repeat around 36 sts instructions round 27 k1 m1r ssk repeat around rm slip 1 st to the right needle pm round 28 k1 ssk repeat around rm slip 1 st to the right needle pm 24 sts with smaller needles co 92 sts round 29 ssk repeat around 12 sts join in the round making sure not to twist stitches on your needles place marker at the round 30 ssk repeat around 6 sts beginning of the round round 1 1x1 rib break yarn leaving 15 cm tail with darning needle pull the tail through all the live repeat 11 times stitches and pull tight weave in ends block slightly using an inflated balloon round 2 increase round k23 m1l repeat 4 times 96 sts 4 sts increased switch to larger needles enjoy your new hat round 3 knit around thank you very much for purchasing the pattern © aneta gasiorowska 2017 all rights reserved if you have any questions or notes please do not hesitate to contact me my ravelry username agasi my e-mail agasi aneta@gmail com
